name: Jaxin
appearance: Sun-browned pilot with a reed-tattoo around his left wrist and a chipped tooth grin. Keeps a horn slung on a bone strap.
character: Bold to recklessness, charming until cornered; hates being told to slow down.
skills: Channel reading by bird flight and foam
talents: Leaping ribs and skiffs with fearless balance
Feeling when a barge will ground a breath before it does
dreams: Become Master of Knots before thirty
Map the tenth mouth that sings
Own a skiff built with saint-glass ribs
secrets: Took Black Net coin to blink the Lantern once
Stashed a stormglass nodule in a knot hall post
Lied to cover a friend's botched run through a reed maze
